General.Name: Newcap Holding A/S
General.Description: Newcap Holding A/S does not have significant operations. Previously, it was involved in the provision of advice on savings and insurance intermediation, and asset management to individuals and companies in Sweden. The company was formerly known as Capinordic A/S and changed its name to Newcap Holding A/S. Newcap Holding A/S was founded in 1989 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
